Room.Name: Annetol's Cave
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a hidden cave on the cliffs overlooking the river Othax.
Room.LongDescription: Annetol is a rather large blue dragon that you didn't think was still alive. The very old blue dragon is therefore much more powerful than a standard, mature dragon you've seen in museums, but he's also a bit slower. Annetol has a bad temper, but tends to be cordial to avoid wasting his energy.
